changelog.title: Fixed Broken Link
changelog.description: OSI Visualizer 'View Presentation' button now correctly links to the presentation.

changelog.title: Script House Presentations
changelog.description: 23 reading-focused modules now accessible: 15 CLH presentations and 8 Python chapter presentations.

changelog.title: Security Fix
changelog.description: Added AccessGuard protection to all CLH presentation files for proper access control.
